bill_to_vendor_by_default.description:
Whether or not the vendor requests that they be assigned as the
bill-to party when they get tendered loads. Setting is read-only,
and will not be present when this object is part of a list.

items.description: Enum of special reserved IdentyfingCode types
Operating authority details for a carrier or broker

is_3pl.description: True if the Brokerage is actually a 3PL

display_name.description:
Read-only name of the Carrier which will be its dba_name if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's name

display_primary_email.description:
Read-only email of the Carrier which will be its email if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's email

display_primary_phone_number.description:
Read-only phone number of the Carrier which will be its phone number if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's phone number

feature_flags.description:
Read-only set of boolean flags that describe what features
a Company has enabled

alerts_dashboard_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to use alerts dashboard

automatic_carrier_policy_enabled.description: Flag that allows for automatic carrier policy feature to be enabled

bid_manager_enabled.description: Flag that allows users to use the bid manager feature

can_book_manual_shipments.description:
Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not
it should display manual shipment booking pages

can_initiate_mobile_ping_tracking.description: Flag that allows a company to initiate cell phone ping tracking requests

can_override_bill_to_for_automated_ltl.description:
Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not to render
bill-to override dialog for autobook LTL shipments

carrier_prioritization_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to access the carrier prioritization features.

ch_robinson_enabled.description: Flag that allows shipments created by Company to create and delete CHR Orders if CHR customer code is also set

contracts_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to use contracts and SLAs

edi_invoicing_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to dispatch invoices via EDI

freightwaves_driver_texts_enabled.description: Temp flag that allows user to see the freightwaves demo functionality

ftl_instant_rates_enabled.description: Flag that enables a companies usage of FTL Instant Rates

genesis_ltl_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to access Genesis LTL

historical_pricing_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to view historical pricing data visualization

integrations_enabled.description: Flag that enables third party applications supported on the platform capability

invoicing_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to access invoicing features.

load_board_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to post shipments to the load board

netsuite_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to use Netsuite

new_dashboard_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to see the new dashboard views

order_consolidation_workflows_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to use order consolidation workflows

policies_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to use policies

purchase_orders_enabled.description: Flag that enables purchase order capability

rate_tables_enabled.description: Flag that allows fuel and accessorial rate tables to be rendered

rmis_enabled.description: Flag that enables syncing carrier profile data from RMIS

saferwatch_enabled.description: Flag that enables syncing carrier profile data from SaferWatch

send_shipwell_network_enabled.description: Flag that allows users to send quotes to the shipwell network

shipment_details_redesign_enabled.description: Flag that allows for enabling usage of newly redesigned shipment detail

show_load_board.description: Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not to display the load board

stop_status_enabled.description: Flag that allows stop statuses to be enabled

supplier_invites_enabled.description: Flag that enables a company from sending supplier invite links

triumph_pay_enabled.description: Flag that enables company to use the Triumph Pay integration

uses_3pl_quoting_flow.description: Flag that instructs frontend to render the 3PL-specific quoting flow

user.description: Id of the user that this PointOfContact refers

is_3pl.description: True if the Brokerage is actually a 3PL

display_name.description:
Read-only name of the Carrier which will be its dba_name if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's name

display_primary_email.description:
Read-only email of the Carrier which will be its email if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's email

display_primary_phone_number.description:
Read-only phone number of the Carrier which will be its phone number if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's phone number
